com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache

Class DefinedCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache.AbstractRefCache<K,V>
      • com.pb.sawdust.util.collections.cache.DefinedCache<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of keys for this cache.
    V - The type of values for this cache.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>, java.util.Map<K,V>

    public class DefinedCache<K,V>
extends AbstractRefCache<K,V>
    The DefinedCache provides a cache which is explicitly cleaned via method calls. That is, the only way to remove key-value pairs from the cache is through the pullKey(Object) method. Key-value pairs are removed lazily: calling pullKey(Object) queues a key-value pair for removal, but only when the cache is cleaned will the pair be removed.

    • Method Detail

      • clipCache

        protected K clipCache(SetDeque<K> keys)
        Description copied from class: AbstractRefCache
        Clip a cache key from the cache map. This method is used to clean the cache: it is repeatedly called to determine what key-value pair should be removed from the cache. If no key should be removed, this method will return null. The cache key returned by this method will be removed from the cache (along with its corresponding value). This method takes the deque of keys as an input, and a cache key returned (for removal) should also have its corresponding key removed from the deque by this method.
        Specified by:
        clipCache in class AbstractRefCache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        keys - The deque of this cache's keys, ordered by key referencing.
        Returns:
        a cache key to be removed from the cache, or null if one should not be removed.

      • pullKey

        public boolean pullKey(K key)
        Queue a key-value pair for removal for removal from this cache. The pair will not be immediately removed; instead, the removal will occur the next time the cache is cleaned.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove.
        Returns:
        true if key is a key in this cache and has not already been slated for pulling, false otherwise.
